description: Join us for an exciting online photography course designed for digital SLR camera enthusiasts, hobbyists, and aspiring professionals. In this course you will learn how to use the manual controls of your digital SLR camera. The lessons are divided into 13 lessons, each of which focuses on only one topic. Hands-on and step-by-step teaching enhances the learning process so you can fully absorb one concept before moving on to another. The course has over 150 minutes of video, and is very interactive with funsessments and funsigments to enhance the learning experience. You can always be in touch with the instructor with a 24/7 discussion board. Take Creative Control of Your DSLR Camera is the most comprehensive beginner photography course on the internet.
title: Learn Digital SLR Photography for Beginners
